title: Coding
content: I used to like coding in my spare time. Now I'm 48, and though I enjoy it, I hardly feel eager to learn yet another way to make my javascript cross platform, implement relational tables or iterate through a list.

title: Developers
content: Developers that know how to code can easily pick up any language you throw at them.

title: Googling things is okay
content: Don't know how/where to start? Just google it!
